## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/foreachloop">ForeachLoop</a> - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> the iteration state associated with a for loop.

This is used to instantiate items in the loop body.

IterVar is allowed to be null, in which case no iteration variable is defined in the loop at all. (This happens when a <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/foreachloop">ForeachLoop</a> is constructed by desugaring an if statement.)

Definition at line 63 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tgparser-h">TGParser.h</a>.
